snippet: Federal authorities said there were “strong preliminary indications” that a Border Patrol agent who was killed on Tuesday was shot by another agent.
abstract: Federal authorities say there are strong preliminary indications that Nicholas Ivie, Border Patrol agent killed in shooting in Arizona near border with Mexico, was accidentally shot by another agent.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities said there were “strong preliminary indications” that a Border Patrol agent who was killed on Tuesday was shot by another agent.

headline.seo: Accident Suspected in Agent’s Death on Mexican Border
headline.main: Accident Suspected in Agent’s Death on Mexican Border
headline.print_headline: Accident Suspected In Death At Border
